snippet: Payrolls in the private sector increased by 169,000 in April, the ADP National Employment Report showed, the fewest since January 2014.
abstract: ADP National Employment Report finds payrolls in private sector rose by 169,000 in April; Labor Department says productivity in first quarter fell at 1.9 percent annual rate after dropping at revised 2.1 rate in fourth quarter.
lead_paragraph: Payrolls in the private sector increased by 169,000 in April, the ADP National Employment Report showed, the fewest since January 2014.

headline.main: Private Employers Add Fewest Jobs in a Year, and Nonfarm Productivity Falls
headline.print_headline: Private Sector Hiring Slows, and Production Costs Rise
